alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 21 at 4:53PM MDT until June 21 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 453 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Ellicott, or 22 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Ellicott and Truckton. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
